585400.name: Unreal Heroes Demo
585400.description:
Unreal Heroes

is a 2D game inspired by strike force heroes and built on unreal engine 4.

The game will contain only deathmatch mode at the pre-release but the final version will contain different mode like :

  • - Team deathmatch
  • - Zombie Waves Survival co-op up to 4 players
  • - Capture the Flag
  • - Single Player or Co-op Missions up to 2 players
  • - Longest Run Mode ( where you have to progress as much as you can on an infinite map and survive )
  • - Editor to create/share maps
  • - Game Mode Creator

Every Players will have a profile with stats,levels and stuff

Those modes will be added one by one after the pre-release depending on the community wishes.
585400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
